Name: Gunstar Heroes
About the game: The Gunstar family are the protectors of the planet Gunstar 9. After many years of peace, vicious dictator Colonel Red kidnapped the Gunstar twins’ older brother and used mind control to make him his slave. Now, with the aid of the Mystical Gems, he’s threatening to release Golden Silver the Destructor from the Gunstar 9 moon, with apocalyptic consequences!
Meta Title: Gunstar Heroes: Jan 26, 2011, SEGA and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Gunstar Heroes? Check out the release date (Jan 26, 2011), developer insights from SEGA, and a complete game summary.
